title: Justification from the Mean Value Theorem

content.prompt: The function g is continuous on the closed interval [1, 4] with g(1) = 5 and g(4) = 8. Of the following conditions, which would guarantee that there is a number c in the open interval (1, 4) where g'(c) = 1 ?

choices.label: g is increasing on the closed interval [1, 4].
g is differentiable on the open interval (1, 4).
g has a maximum value on the closed interval [1, 4].
The graph of g has at least one horizontal tangent in the open interval (1, 4).

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
